name: UploadVendorList
description:
Upload a batch of up to 500 vendors to Ramp.

Use this tool to upload a batch of up to 500 vendors to Ramp in an all-or-nothing manner. Ensure that the vendor data is clean and does not contain duplicates already on Ramp to avoid batch rejection. For updating existing vendors, use a different endpoint.

parameters.name: vendor_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing up to 500 vendors with their IDs and names for classification of Ramp transactions.

id.description: Remote/external ID of accounting vendor in ERP system.

vendors.description: A list of vendors that you want to use to classify your Ramp transactions.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

id.description: Remote/external ID of accounting vendor in ERP system.

vendors.description: A list of vendors that you want to use to classify your Ramp transactions.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
